title: [Self-Directed] Language Proficiency Improvement Program Using Blended Learning Formative Assessments

context.additional_context: Personalized language learning program conducted in mobile environments using digital devices. Applies a blended learning model providing real-time learning feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their language proficiency at least twice weekly through LMS-based formative assessments.
Upon completing the six-month course, learners achieve reading and writing proficiency equivalent to TOPIK Level 4 or higher in the target language.
Learners can analyze online activity data to develop self-directed learning plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
